main event: A civilian pilot observed a glowing object in the sky over Barbados, which appeared to be the size of a basketball at an altitude of 1,000-1,500 feet on April 6, 1958.
interesting points: The object was noted to have a 'winking' effect while traversing the sky., The estimated speed of the object was between 70-100 mph., The sighting lasted approximately 51 minutes., Investigators concluded it had characteristics common with a meteoric phenomenon., The event was classified under ground-radar observations.
sighted object: a glowing object resembling a basketball
